titleStmt.title: Epigrammes in the oldest cut, and newest fashion A twise seuen houres (in so many weekes) studie no longer (like the fashion) not vnlike to continue. The first seuen. Iohn Weeuer.
titleStmt.author: Weever, John, 1576-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V. S[ims] for Thomas Bushell, and are to be sold at his shop at the great north doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the great north doore of Paules
